summary: Verified all new features for RUNETIC E-Commerce: Image carousel, color configuration, WOMPI production key, and wholesale discount editing. All 12 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Updated product ea173f09-45b9-4192-9a2d-202fe5a5bff7 with test colors
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified working: 1) Image carousel with thumbnails and prev/next navigation, 2) Color selection (12 colors) in admin product edit, 3) WOMPI production key (pub_prod_ZYEmuh53kkm4KCXQyfarBXyoA53htiRW), 4) Wholesale discount tiers editable with save functionality.

image_carousel.details: Product detail page has image carousel with thumbnails (5 images), prev/next navigation arrows on hover, image counter (1/5, 2/5, etc.), clickable thumbnails to change main image

color_configuration.details: Admin product edit dialog has 'Colores Disponibles' section with toggle checkbox. When enabled, shows 12 color options (Blanco, Negro, Rojo, Azul, Amarillo, Verde, Naranja, Rosa, Morado, Gris, Azul Marino, Dorado). Colors saved to product and displayed on product detail page.

wompi_production_key.details: WOMPI config API returns production key: pub_prod_ZYEmuh53kkm4KCXQyfarBXyoA53htiRW

wholesale_discount_editing.details: Admin Discounts page has 'Descuentos Mayoristas' tab with 4 editable tier levels. Each tier has Cantidad Mínima, Cantidad Máxima, and % Descuento fields. 'Guardar Cambios' button saves tiers. Preview table shows calculated prices.

product_update_colors.details: PUT /api/products/{id} accepts available_colors field and saves correctly. GET /api/products/{id} returns available_colors in response.
